about_the_game:
In Who is Abby, immerse yourself in a narrative-rich journey of exploration and interactive puzzle-solving. Tom's sister, Abby, is missing again. Distrustful of the police and driven by past experiences, Tom embarks on an intense quest to uncover the truth. Navigate a world shrouded in mystery and intrigue, where each chapter unveils new secrets and draws you deeper into the heart of Abby’s enigmatic disappearance.

Explore beautifully detailed environments

Explore meticulously crafted environments. Every step in Who is Abby reveals a world rich in detail and atmosphere, inviting you to uncover its hidden depths.

Interact with objects in the world

On your quest to find Abby, you will inspect hundreds of different objects throughout the world, some of which are extremely important for your progress.

Uncover the Clues!

Embark on a detective journey in Who is Abby, where every corner of the world hides clues crucial to your quest. Discover notes and images that weave together the intricate story of Abby's disappearance and the world around you.

Features:


Narrative-Driven Gameplay: Combining the elements of first-person exploration with the interactivity of classic adventure games, enter into a world meticulously crafted both in visual detail and narrative depth. Immerse yourself in a multi-chapter story line that keeps you guessing at every turn. Experience a gripping story centered around Tom's relentless search for Abby. What secrets await?

Interactive Exploration: Navigate beautifully detailed environments, uncovering clues and hints essential to the narrative. Each discovery pushes the story forward.

Stunning Graphics and Sound: Powered by Unreal Engine 5, Who is Abby boasts cutting-edge visuals that bring every detail of Tom's world to life. Each chapter unfolds with rich environments and atmospheric surroundings.
detailed_description:
JOIN US ON DISCORD


About the Demo

In Who is Abby, immerse yourself in a narrative-rich journey of exploration and interactive puzzle-solving. Tom's sister, Abby, is missing again. Distrustful of the police and driven by past experiences, Tom embarks on an intense quest to uncover the truth. Navigate a world shrouded in mystery and intrigue, where each chapter unveils new secrets and draws you deeper into the heart of Abby’s enigmatic disappearance.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A suspenseful psychological thriller, in Who is Abby you unravel a mystery through exploration and puzzle-solving. Become Tom on the search for his missing sister Abby and discover the truth behind her disappearance.
